original_text:
Bomber Squad
Una banda di criminali dediti alle rapine, una banca inespugnabile e tanta dinamite sono gli ingredienti di Bomber Squad, la nuova slot targata SimplePlay. Appena apriamo la schermata, ci ritroviamo all’interno di una banca deserta. La grafica ha una definizione unica dovuta allo stile cartoon con cui son stati disegnati i simboli, con tanto di gangster sulla sinistra che a ogni giro spara una raffica di mitra. Durante il gioco bonus la scenografia cambia, il cavo è spalancato e sulla destra è posizionato un altro membro della banda armato di fucile e al braccio una borsa piena di dinamite.
Caratteristiche della slot
La slot ha una griglia classica, con 5 rulli e 3 righe e ben 1024 modi per vincere. La puntata minima è di 0,20 gettoni, con 10 livelli di scommessa e una vincita potenziale di ben 800 volte la puntata.
Bomber Squad offre la possibilità di impostare i giri gratuiti e anche di velocizzare la rotazione dei rulli.
Il Jackpot è progressivo e viene assegnato casualmente, invece il valore RTP corrisponde al 94,35%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Ci sono undici simboli regolari e due bonus. Come in moltissime altre slot, anche qui a pagare meno sono i simboli delle carte dal gioco buone per una scala a poker, quindi dal nove all’asso. Per iniziare a vedere vincite più consistenti dovremo però ambire ai simboli a tema con la slot, ossia la pila, il manifesto Wanted, la borsa traboccante di soldi, il mitra o il poliziotto.
Per quel che riguarda i simboli speciali, il Wild è rappresentato dalla dinamite e appare solo sui rulli 2, 3 e 4. Sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter.
La porta blindata del caveau è invece il nostro Scatter. A differenza di altre slot, per ottenere il bonus è necessario che i simboli siano adiacenti. Prima di iniziare i Free Spins ci verrà data la possibilità di scegliere tra diverse tipologie di bonus. Eccole nel dettaglio:

8 Free Spins e moltiplicatore x10, x15 o x20.
10 Free Spins e moltiplicatore x8, x10 o x15.
15 Free Spins e moltiplicatore x5, x8 o x10.
20 Free Spins e moltiplicatore x3, x5 o x8.
25 Free Spins e moltiplicatore x2, x3 o x5.
Mystery Option che mischia il numero di Free Spins e la dimensione del moltiplicatore.

Durante i Free Spins, quando atterra un Wild, potrebbero accadere che ne compaiano altri in modo casuale.

raw_translation.response:
Bomber Squad: A Blast from the Past

Bomber Squad, the latest slot by SimplePlay, offers a thrilling experience of robbing a seemingly impenetrable bank with a group of bandits armed to the teeth. As the reels spin in this cartoon-style game, the gangster on the left unleashes a volley of bullets in the empty bank. During the bonus round, the scene changes to a ransacked vault guarded by another bandit with a rifle and a bag full of dynamite. 

This classic 5-reel, 3-row slot offers 1024 ways to win, with a minimum bet of 0.20 coins and a potential payout of up to 800 times the bet. The game also features a free spin setting and a fast spin feature, complemented by a progressive jackpot that is randomly assigned.  

The game has eleven regular symbols and two bonus symbols. The lower-paying symbols are the poker cards from nine to ace. The higher-paying symbols are the stack of cash, the wanted poster, the overflowing bag of money, the rifle, and the police officer. The Wild symbol, represented by the dynamite, appears only on reels 2, 3, and 4 and replaces all symbols except the Scatter. The Scatter symbol is the vault door and needs adjacent symbols to trigger the bonus round. Before the Free Spins, the player is offered various bonuses, ranging from 8 to 25 free spins with a multiplier of up to 20x or a mixture of the two.

In the bonus round, landing a Wild symbol triggers additional Wilds randomly, increasing the chances of winning big rewards. With an RTP value of 94.35%, Bomber Squad is a high-energy slot that promises an explosive experience for the experienced gambler.

raw_translation.response:
Bomber Squad is the new slot game by SimplePlay that will take you on a thrilling criminal adventure. Get ready to break into an impregnable bank with a gang of robbers armed with lots of dynamite. The cartoonish symbols, with gangsters shooting their machine guns at each spin, make the game even more exciting. 

Featuring a classic 5-reel, 3-row layout, and 1024 ways to win, Bomber Squad offers the potential of winning big. You can place a minimum bet of 0.20 coins and go up to 10 levels of betting, with a potential win up to 800 times your initial bet. 

This slot is perfect for avid players who love to customize their gameplay experience. You can set up your own free spins and adjust the speed of the reels. Moreover, the Jackpot is progressive and randomly awarded, while the RTP value is 94.35%. 

With 11 regular symbols and 2 bonus symbols, Bomber Squad has plenty of winning combinations that can pay out handsomely. The lower-paying symbols include the standard card symbols from 9 to Ace. However, if you want to hit bigger payouts, you should aim for stack of cash, explosive bags, and guns. 

The Wild symbol is represented by the dynamite and can be found on reels 2, 3, and 4. It can substitute any other symbol except for the Scatter. The Scatter symbol is the vault door and, unlike many other slots, it needs to be adjacent to trigger the bonus round. Before the Free Spins commence, you'll be given the option to choose from five different bonus options, each with its own set of multipliers and free spins. 

As an experienced gambler, you should definitely give Bomber Squad a go. With its exciting storyline, unique symbols, and customizable gameplay, you'll be on the edge of your seat. Don't miss out on your chance to hit the jackpot!

The Wild symbol represented by the dynamite can substitute any other symbol except for the Scatter. Bonus Features and Free Spins

Before commencing the Free Spins, players can choose from five different bonus options with their own set of multipliers and free spins. In addition to the bonus features, the game also offers a randomly awarded progressive jackpot. The Wild symbol represented by the dynamite can substitute any other symbol except for the Scatter.
